alert.note: Alert for Gallatin (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 13 at 10:11AM MDT until June 16 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Montana... Gallatin River at Logan affecting Gallatin County. Gallatin River near DCP-Gallatin R/Gateway affecting Gallatin County. .Heavy rain falling on a melting snowpack is causing rising river levels. For the Gallatin River...including DCP-Gallatin R/Gateway, Logan... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor to moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Gallatin River at Logan. * WHEN...Until Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...At 9.9 feet, water into USGS gage house. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM MDT Monday the stage was 8.4 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a maximum value of 9.9 feet tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 9.9 feet on 01/16/1974. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by Tuesday morning.Tuesday morning at 1000 AM MDT.
